name: Jhankar Mahbub
review: Tesla's Model S was the first mass-market car to prove that EVs can be exciting to drive, viable as daily transportation, and usable for long trips.

name: SaJeeb Ahmeed
review: Tesla has singlehandedly changed the electric-car landscape, and the 2021 Model 3 is the least expensive way to get one of these tech wonders in your driveway.

name: Zareen Tashneem
review: As the SUV cousin of the Model S sedan, the 2021 Tesla Model X might be the greenest—and one of the fastest—ways to tote up to seven people or lots of cargo

name: Karina Islam
review: Among the more affordable options in the electric-vehicle marketplace, the Tesla Model 3 is arguably the one with the most name recognition.

name: Mark Otto
review: The latest from Tesla is the all-electric Model Y compact SUV, which shares its platform and most of its cabin with the Model 3 sedan but has more cargo space

name: Chris JJ Mohamed
review: Touted to make its return to the lineup in 2023, the new Tesla Roadster picks up where the old model left off.

name: Mr Jhon Doe
review: Tesla has singlehandedly changed the electric-car landscape, and the Model 3 is the least expensive way to get one of the company's tech wonders in your driveway.
